meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Steinpreis Carly Gramer Alistair Bell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6500.

td.p: Matt Steinpreis, a graduate student and research assistant originally from Plymouth, Wisconsin
Carly Gramer, an associate editor of textbooks from Orlando, Florida
Alistair Bell, a computer chip designer from Berlin, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,199)

tr.td: ANTIQUES
ROAD SHOW
ABBREVIATIONS
EUROPEAN RULERS
COLORFUL MOVIES
STARTS WITH "M"
